00055 void RunInformation::get(const EVENT::LCRunHeader *run){
00056   const EVENT::LCParameters & params = run->getParameters();
00057   _beamEnergyMeV=params.getIntVal("beamEnergyMeV");
00058   _isMC=static_cast<bool>(params.getIntVal("isMC"));
00059   //_location=static_cast<Location>(params.getIntVal("location"));
00060   _location=params.getStringVal("location");
00061   _runMonth=params.getStringVal("runMonth");
00062   _runStart=params.getIntVal("runStartSec")*1000000000LL+params.getIntVal("runStartNs");
00063   _runEnd=params.getIntVal("runEndSec")*1000000000LL+params.getIntVal("runEndNs");
00064 
00065 }
00066 void RunInformation::set(EVENT::LCRunHeader *run) const{
00067   EVENT::LCParameters & params = run->parameters();
00068   params.setValue("isMC",static_cast<int>(_isMC));
00069   params.setValue("beamEnergyMeV",_beamEnergyMeV);
00070   params.setValue("location",_location);
00071   params.setValue("runMonth",_runMonth);
00072 
00073   UTIL::LCTime rs=_runStart;
00074   params.setValue("runStartSec",rs.unixTime());
00075   params.setValue("runStartNs",rs.ns());
00076 
00077   UTIL::LCTime re=_runEnd;
00078   params.setValue("runEndSec",re.unixTime());
00079   params.setValue("runEndNs",re.ns());
00080 
00081 }
00082

00084 std::ostream& RunInformation::print(std::ostream &o) const {
00085 
00086 
00087   o << std::endl << "#########################" << 
00088     "RunInformation::print()" << std::endl <<
00089     "ISMC = " << _isMC << "," << std::endl <<
00090     "Beam E (MeV) = " << _beamEnergyMeV << "," << std::endl
00091   //if (_location == RunInformation::desy) o << "location = DESY," << std::endl;
00092   //else if (_location == RunInformation::cern) o << "location = CERN," << std::endl;
00093   //else if (_location == RunInformation::fnal) o << "location = FNAL," << std::endl;
00094   //else o << "location unknown : " << _location << "," << std::endl;
00095     << "Location= " << _location << std::endl
00096     << "Run month/year: " << _runMonth << "," 
00097     << std::endl;
00098 
00099   UTIL::LCTime rs=_runStart;
00100   UTIL::LCTime re=_runEnd;
00101   o << "Run valid between = " << rs.getDateString() << " and " << re.getDateString() << std::endl;
00102   o << std::endl << "#########################" << std::endl;
00103 
00104   return o;
00105 }
